metadata.title: KK Bookmark Checker - Clean Duplicate & Dead Bookmarks | Chrome Extension
metadata.description: A professional Chrome extension for managing bookmarks. Intelligently detects dead links and duplicates for one-click cleanup, bringing order to your browser bookmarks. Trusted by 10,000+ users.
metadata.keywords: Bookmark manager, Chrome extension, Dead link checker, Duplicate bookmark remover, Browser extension, Bookmark organizer

hero.subtitle: Intelligently scan for dead links and duplicates with a single click. Give your browser's bookmarks a fresh start. Trusted by tens of thousands of users to organize their digital library.

features.title: Why Choose KK Bookmark Checker?
features.subtitle: The professional tool to make your digital life more efficient and organized.

list.title: Dead Link Detection
list.description: Automatically scans and identifies unreachable bookmarks, helping you clean up outdated content.

list.title: Duplicate Cleanup
list.description: Intelligently finds and merges duplicate bookmarks, making your collection cleaner and more relevant.

list.title: One-Click Batch Actions
list.description: Supports batch deleting, moving, and organizing bookmarks to dramatically improve your management efficiency.

list.title: Secure & Reliable
